sentence.Network_en: "I know you don't believe me," I said resignedly.
sentence.Network_cn: “我知道你不相信我，”我无可奈何地说。

sentence.Network_en: Her hostess might be speculating, resignedly on the cause of her delay.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的女主人一定在那里不耐烦地猜测她为什么还不回来.

sentence.Network_en: She noticed that Muffat was sitting resignedly on a narrow divan - bed.
sentence.Network_cn: 她看见莫法正垂头丧气地坐在一张不宽的坐床上.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... resigned 顺从的 resignedly 听从地 resile 有弹力.
resignedly , I telegraphed back that it was all right with me if he insisted., 我顺从地发电报回去说 , 如果他坚持的话我可以接受.
reside-相近词汇-新浪字典 ... resignation 辞职,辞呈,听从 resignedly 听从地,服从地 resilience 弹回,有弹力,恢复力.
Peter nodded resignedly ., 彼得无可奈何地点点头.

entry.tran: 屈从的;顺从的;勉强接受的;逆来顺受的
entry.def: If you are resigned to an unpleasant situation or fact, you accept it without complaining because you realize that you cannot change it.

example.ex: He is resigned to the noise and mess...
example.tran: 他勉强接受了这里的喧嚣和脏乱。

example.ex: Pauline was already resigned to losing her home.
example.tran: 保利娜已经无奈地接受了失去家园的事实。

means.word_mean: 1. with resignation and acceptance; in a resigned manner;

sentences.sentence: "resignedly, I telegraphed back that it was all right with me if he insisted"

auth_sentence.content: Resignedly handing over my card, I clarify the facts.

auth_sentence.content: Kicking off her flip-flops, she settled resignedly into her game.

auth_sentence.content: She notes resignedly that that is the way it goes and life continues.
